title: Phase 1:
text:
- y Trigger any ability, or effect, that relies on a Hero reaching zero health.

- y If they are still on zero health they die and are removed from the battlefield. If they are not on zero health skip to step 6.

- y Their Soul is automatically harvested by the Hero that caused the final damage point (see ' Soul Harvesting ' pg.76).

- y Any additional Souls that were Bound to the dead Hero are immediately removed from the game and the opposing Effigy gains back that health.

- y Any Tokens that are on that Hero can now be removed from the game.

Note: All Tokens and other effects that the dead Hero has in play still remain in play (for example, Sir Marcus' wall or Haksa's Idols).
